messages.content:
{
  "exceptionId": "EX-20231103-001",
  "exceptionType": "Validation Failure",
  "severity": "high",
  "description": "Missing critical invoice metadata required for processing. Vendor details, invoice number, dates, purchase order number, tax information, and GL code are not provided.",
  "rootCause": "User only supplied the amount ($100) without any supporting invoice details such as vendor name, invoice number, dates, PO number, tax rates, or account codes.",
  "impact": {
    "paymentDelay": "Yes",
    "vendorRelationshipRisk": "Medium",
    "financialImpact": {
      "amount": 100,
      "description": "Potential delay in payment of $100 until complete invoice data is received."
    }
  },
  "recommendedActions": [
    "Request complete invoice details from the submitter.",
    "Validate vendor and purchase order information before posting.",
    "Enter missing data into the ERP system once received."
  ],
  "requiredInformation": [
    "Vendor Name",
    "Vendor ID",
    "Vendor Address",
    "Vendor Tax ID",
    "Vendor Bank Account",
    "Invoice Number",
    "Invoice Date",
    "Due Date",
    "Payment Terms",
    "Purchase Order Number",
    "Tax Rate breakdown",
    "Tax Amount breakdown",
    "Account Code / GL Code",
    "Amount in Words"
  ],
  "assignedTo": "AP Team",
  "dueDate": "2023-11-05",
  "notificationsSent": [
    "AP Team",
    "Submitter"
  ],
  "status": "open"
}
